title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Introducing the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor! Add a touch of elegance and sophistication to your living space with these stunning iron frame mirrors. 

Featuring a unique circle on circles design, these mirrors serve as both wall art and functional decor. Each set includes 2 mirrors, allowing you to create a stylish arrangement that suits your taste. 

The medium-sized mirrors measure 15.7 inches in diameter with the frame and 10 inches in diameter for the mirror alone. The iron frame adds durability and a touch of luxury with its gold color and finish, falling between matte and bright.

Installation is a breeze with the easy-to-hang single screw method. Weighing only 2 pounds, these mirrors are lightweight and effortless to handle. The high-quality annealed glass ensures HD imaging, preventing warping and distortion for a clear and crisp reflection.

The versatility of these mirrors knows no bounds. They effortlessly match various decoration styles, making them suitable for any room in your home, including the living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, and even your office space. 

Create your own picture wall, place them above your TV, pair them with paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconcesâ€”the possibilities are endless! 

Rest assured, these mirrors are packaged with care to ensure safe delivery.
